title: gdb crashes running 6.out
body:
on freebsd9, using gdb7.3.1 installed from ports with all options (threading, expat,
python and sth else i forgot)
gdb crashes on 

gdb 6.out
...> run

[New LWP 100204]
Bus Error (core dumped).

setting a breakpoint on main.main, running till there and continuing works.

this is without the pretty printers loaded (broken for unrelated reason, but that
excludes them as a potential cause).
